content.question: The selection process for the chief executive helps distinguish systems that fuse powers from systems that separate powers.(a) Describe two steps in the process of selecting the British prime minister.(b) Explain how the selection process for the British prime minister reflects a fusion of power.(c) Describe the process of selecting the Mexican president.(d) Explain how the selection process for the Mexican president reflects a separation of power.
